pkgmetadata.longdescription: # The Multi-Agent Arcade Learning Environment## OverviewThis is a fork of the [Arcade Learning Environment (ALE)](https://github.com/mgbellemare/Arcade-Learning-Environment). It is mostly backwards compatible with ALE and it also supports certain games with 2 and 4 players.To install it in Python, please use `pip install multi-agent-ale-py`## Citation```@article{terry2020arcade, Title = {Multiplayer Support for the Arcade Learning Environment}, Author = {Terry, Justin K and Black, Benjamin}, journal={arXiv preprint arXiv:2009.09341}, year={2020}}```
